about_the_game:
Go to your neighbor's house and end up in a glitchy nightmare.

The darkest matrix ever created


You wake up in the middle of a dark and cold room, not knowing who you are. Not knowing where you need to go. Not knowing what is real or not around you. Not even remembering what your dreams were...

Navigate through a bleak and terrifying universe to find your answers in the matrix, discern the real from the fake, and confront your worst illusions. Fight to escape this nightmare filled with bugs and terrifying visions in this psychological horror game.

"I went to see the neighboring to get acquainted ... Then, I blacked out... I don’t remember anything after ! Now I’m lost in this ******* house and I can’t get home !"

A world unique in its kind


The universe of My Dear Neighbor, edition 404, is vast and aims to offer something unique. The goal in all of this is to make the impossible and illogical possible. This parallel world is designed for those with a great sense of imagination.
This demo will only show you a tiny part of what the complete game will be.

name: My Dear Neighbor, edition 404 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM GeForce GTX 1030, AMD RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4,69 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB VRAM GeForce RTX 2080, AMD Radeon VII
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4,69 GB available space

short_description: My Dear Neighbor, edition 404 is a survival horror game that tells the story of your neighbor. Go to your neighbor's house and end up in a glitchy nightmare. Fight your way out of this glitched nightmare amid bugs and nightmarish visions in this psychological horror game.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian
*languages with full audio support
